Resume

Creator oficomoon-generator and html-css-boilerplate

Writer at Javascript Plainenglish on Medium and https://javascript.plainenglish.io

I have good experience in developing product, designing frontend applications, appliying correct software patterns and architecture and large zero-to-one SAAS projects. As a frontend developer, I have 5years of experience with full of passion, curiosity and love. To build better and great companies, I can offer you my soft engineering skills, previous experiences and with my best practises that I gain from Startup and the projects which I worked on in the past at the companies which are unicorn, decacorn and billion dollar companies. And still there are lots of things to learn on there.
